Package at.tugraz.ist.ase.cacdr.algorithms.hs

Class HSTree

java.lang.Object
at.tugraz.ist.ase.cacdr.algorithms.hs.AbstractHSConstructor
at.tugraz.ist.ase.cacdr.algorithms.hs.HSTree
Direct Known Subclasses:
HSDAG
public class HSTree extends AbstractHSConstructor
Implementation of the HS-tree algorithm. IHSLabeler algorithms have to return labels (conflict or diagnosis) which are guaranteed to be minimal. For example: QuickXPlain, MXP, FastDiag source: https://github.com/jaccovs/Master-project
Author:
Viet-Man Le (vietman.le@ist.tugraz.at)

    • selectLabel

      protected Set<Constraint> selectLabel(List<Set<Constraint>> labels)
      Selects a conflict/diagnosis to label a node from a list of conflicts/diagnoses. This implementation simply returns the first conflict/diagnosis from the given list.
      Parameters:
      labels - list of labels (conflicts/diagnoses)
      Returns:
      node label
